function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elderly people taking more time for forms fill-in and vaccine inoculation","Impact":"Increased wait times and congestion in vaccination centers","Mitigation":"Provide dedicated assistance and support for elderly patients to speed up the process","Technologies":"Queue management systems, appointment scheduling software","People":"Elderly individuals, vaccination center staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Probability differences between adults and elderly people","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling and prediction of vaccination process for elderly individuals","Mitigation":"Collect and analyze specific data for elderly population, adjust model parameters accordingly","Technologies":"Data-fitting software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Research team, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Time measurements and distributions for vaccination process parameters","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation and prediction of vaccination process, leading to suboptimal resource allocation","Mitigation":"Use accurate time measurements and distributions, validate simulation model with real-world data","Technologies":"Simulation software, data-fitting software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Research team, public health authorities","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"}]}
